itemdesc-veinboundtome: A living codex of blood alchemy.
itemdesc-clayplate-blue-fired:
A smooth, fired clay slab awaiting inscription. Heavy with potential and faintly warm to the touch.
Used at an Altar or Inscription Table to imprint the sigils of blood rites.
blockdesc-log-placed-bloodroot-ud: Its roots drink deeper than water — they find the pulse beneath the earth. — Veinbound Tome, Fragment XXXI
